#summary List of changes in TextAnim new versions.

Here are just some highlights of the life of TextAnim, since when it started until the present day, without many details. Of course, I'll never remember it.

* *11.10.08* - Add anchor setting and time override interval property.


*04.20.08*

 * Create callback functions and first TextAnimTool getColorBounds.

*09.05.07* - 1.1.3

 * Add the HTML support and important fixes with TextFormat and text align.

*02.10.07* - 1.0.0

 * Called TextAnim as first AS3 version, metrics of text, multiline textfield.

*12.15.06*

 * Create instances to a given object.

*08.22.06* 

 * First version, AS2 prototype, no multiline, called LetterMotion.
